headline: Tracking Warren Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway Portfolio - Q3 2024 Update
summary: Berkshire Hathaway's Q3 2024 13F portfolio changes included new stakes in Domino's Pizza and Pool Corp, and reductions in AAPL and BAC stocks. Read more here.

headline: Chubb (CB) Upgraded to Buy: Here's Why
summary: Chubb (CB) might move higher on growing optimism about its earnings prospects, which is reflected by its upgrade to a Zacks Rank #2 (Buy).

headline: 5 P&C Insurance Stocks to Gain From Prudent Underwriting
summary: Zacks Property and Casualty Insurance players like PGR, CB, TRV, ALL and CINF are likely to benefit from catastrophes that drive policy renewal rate and pricing.
